title: KCRW 89.9FM | Music, NPR News, Culture Los Angeles
description: KCRW creates & curates music discovery, NPR news, cultural exploration and informed public affairs. From Los Angeles to around the world, KCRW.com.
cleaned_text: DJ Shows [Music](https://www.kcrw.com/categories/music) Fanatic! I hope you're having a great September weekend, no matter where you are. I've been sitting on this information for weeks and now, finally, I can exhale. [](https://www.kcrw.com/culture/shows/life-examined/brad-stulberg-master-of-change-transitions-transformation-life-coach) How to change: Strategies for doing it the healthy (and successful) way [Psychology](https://www.kcrw.com/categories/psychology) Brad Stulberg, who writes and teaches about well-being, explores the science of change and explains how to let go of the familiar and become our masters of momentum. [](https://www.kcrw.com/music/shows/morning-becomes-eclectic/morning-becomes-eclectic-playlist-september-5-2023) MBE playlist Sept. 5: New LP previews + comforting classics [Best New Music](https://www.kcrw.com/categories/best-new-music) Sample the sweet sounds of Jamila Woods' forthcoming LP "Water Made Us," and more.
